text: Novo Santo Antônio (Portuguese for "New Saint Anthony") is a Brazilian municipality of the state of Piauí. The population is 3,387 (2015 est.) in an area of 481.71 km².Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística The municipality contains the Araguaia State Park, created in 2001. ==References== ==External links== * citybrazil.com.br * Altair on Explorevale Category:Municipalities in Piauí
title: Novo Santo Antônio
